extendedInfo.description: Find Me Emergency Buttons :   One Button Emergency Notification; If someone is lost or needs help, app sends text, email and makes phone call to designated emergency contact(s) with the touch of one button. App provides senderâs exact location with turn-by-turn directions to the emergency contact. Meet Me Button:If someone needs directions or meeting friends, they can select unlimited contacts from their contact list, and send everyone a link with turn-by-turn directions to the senderâs exact location.
